thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Global Stocks Selloff Extends to Asia

author: Kenan Machado
title: Global Stocks Selloff Extends to Asia
text:
Stocks in Japan, Europe erase 2018 gains S&P 500 on track for third consecutive daily decline Government bond yields stabilize U.S. stocks continued sliding Monday as fears about rising inflation and higher government bond yields interrupted the long-running market rally.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 462 points, or 1.8%, to 25058. The S&P 500 lost 1.6% and the Nasdaq Composite fell 1.1%--with both indexes heading toward their first three-day declines since December.
...
